message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business. Given its high value and potential impact, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950000. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $950000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $850000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it could bring to my business.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I appreciate your input and am willing to negotiate further. In light of your proposal, I am now offering the product at $900000. This price reflects a compromise between our initial offer and your counteroffer, while still allowing us to cover our costs and maintain a reasonable profit margin.

Thank you for considering my previous offer and making a counteroffer. I'm still interested in the product, but $900000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $875000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it could bring to my business.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering our costs and the value proposition of the product, I am prepared to offer the product at $887500. This price aims to balance our financial requirements with your budget constraints, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $887500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you at $880000. I believe this price is fair and reasonable, considering the value the product will bring to my business.

After reviewing your latest offer, Bob, I've decided to make a final counteroffer. I am willing to sell the product at $885000. This price reflects a compromise between our original offer and your most recent proposal, aiming to provide a fair solution for both parties while ensuring we achieve a satisfactory return on our investment.

I understand that this is your final offer, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $880000, but no higher. I hope you can understand my position and consider one last adjustment.
